task.title: How to Create a Folder?
task.shortdesc: Learn how to create a custom folder to organize your emails.

taskbody.prereq: You have to be logged into your Mail App account.

context.p: Organizing email is an easy way to browse through your mails. Aside from your basic folders, explained in , you can have custom ones by following these steps.

result.p: You now have a new custom folder where you can move your emails.

example.p: To create a custom folder for, let's say, "Marketing offers", click the "Add new folder" button. Name the folder "Marketing offers", write a short description "Containing vouchers and discounts for my mailing lists.", and click "Add button."
